Title: Relates to the creation, consolidation, division, and alteration of election districts by the board of elections in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the creation, consolidation, division, and alteration of election districts by the board of elections in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the creation, consolidation, division, and alteration of election districts by the board of elections in the city of New York
